title: Ticket #1610: document behavior of file transfer for various failure cases
description:
from Miron: it will be good to include in our documentation a discussion on what happens to file transfers when the job fails or when the submitting site runs out of disk space ...

from Karen: indeed this is not documented and should be
remarks: The new subsection 2.5.4.5 in the 7.4.4 manual (and future 7.5 manuals) has info describing behavior for some file system errors.
